interaction_list.title: Обнаружения объекта слева системой обнаружения
interaction_list.response_set_values: !TARGET!.properties['is_detected'] = !DETECT!.actions.detect(dX=!DETECT!.properties['lat'], dY=!DETECT!.properties['lon'], dZ=!DETECT!.properties['alt'], dAlfa=!DETECT!.properties['dAlfa'], dBetta=!DETECT!.properties['dBetta'], dAx=!DETECT!.properties['look_lat'], dAy=!DETECT!.properties['look_lon'], dAz=!DETECT!.properties['look_alt'], iType=!DETECT!.properties['iType'], dDeltaTmin=!DETECT!.properties['dDeltaTmin'], df=!DETECT!.properties['df'], dsp=!DETECT!.properties['dsp'], iNMx=!DETECT!.properties['iNMx'], iNMy=!DETECT!.properties['iNMy'], dLmax=!DETECT!.properties['detection_radius'], iLight=WEATHER.properties['is_day'], iFrog=WEATHER.properties['is_frog'], dXt=!TARGET!.properties['lat'], dYt=!TARGET!.properties['lon'], dZt=!TARGET!.properties['alt'], dTf=WEATHER.properties['air_temperature'], dL=120, dTc=!TARGET!.properties['case_temperature'], dW=!TARGET!.properties['width'], dH=!TARGET!.properties['height'])
